research_themes.name: Logic, Semantics and Computation
research_themes.description: Investigating models and calculi for fundamental computation.
points: Model theory for non-classical logics such as spatial, temporal or description logics
Calculi for formal deduction and automated reasoning
Mechanisation of proofs and logical operations

research_themes.name: Formal Methods
research_themes.description: Establishing rigorous foundations for system verification.
points: Verification of hybrid and autonomous systems
Languages and frameworks for the formal specification of software systems
Proof assistants and constraint solvers for certified solutions in safety-critical domains

research_themes.name: Design and Analysis of Algorithms
research_themes.description: Developing efficient algorithms for complex challenges.

seminars.speaker: Prof. Alan Turing
seminars.title: Computing Machinery
